reviewText: wrote a review for this before  can not see a reason to repeat  great movie  would like to see more like this
There type movie that the whole family can set down and watch these 3 movie at any time there not boring like some get after time.

Clean, attention grabber movies for my children as well as other children who watched it at our church. My kids said that they like the mystery in these movies. I found myself drawn into these movies as I previewed them for our church library. An enjoyable factor for me was the balance of seriousness & humor.

Negative: A possible negative factor that my one child mentioned is that they used a different actress for the 3rd movie in these series. It didn't bother me, but it may make a difference for others.

My grand daughters loved these movies. Great to find wholesome
entertainment for them while I babysit.
Thanks for speedy service.
My twelve year old granddaughter has read all of these books and loved these videos very much.  Highly recommend these.

This was enjoyable to watch for me and others in my family, even though it is a low budget film. It also has a pretty good story. The dvd's played fine, but the religious stuff in the beginning can be annoying to some, me and my family where ok with it.
Loved the books loved the movie
I appreciated receiving the order quickly. It was for an mid-December birthday gift. I had absolutely nothing to complain about.
These are wonderful movies to be enjoyed by the whole family.  Loved them all
Story line good, acting okay except for Dean Jones and Haley Mills.
My daughter has the books and was happy to receive the movie version.
Great movies, family content and good story lines.
Fun view for kids and adults alike.
These are cute movies that young girls will love. The acting isn't the best, but I grew up with the books, so I enjoyed them anyways and can't wait to watch them with my daughter.
